message.name: ERR_WRITING_LDIF
message.locale: Error encountered writing the export file.

message.name: ERR_LDAP_CONNECT
message.locale: Error establishing connection with the LDAP server.

message.name: ERR_LDAP_DISCONNECT
message.locale: Error disconnecting from the LDAP server.

message.name: ERR_LDAP_INCOMPLETE_EXPORT_FILE
message.locale: Both fileName and filePath should be specified.

message.name: ERR_LDAP_USER_NAME_MUST_SPECIFIED
message.locale: The LDAP user name must be specified.

message.name: ERR_LDAP_PROVIDER_URL_MUST_SPECIFIED
message.locale: The LDAP provider URL must be specified.
